data.text:
If you have any type of food intolerance, tell our staff, we have all the information regarding products that contain allergens.

Available from 8 a.m. to 11:30 a.m.

CONTINENTAL

Fresh orange juice, cereals with full cream or skimmed milk, sliced fresh fruit, normal toast, handmade pastries, butter, jam, coffee or tea

38€

PURA VIDA

Fresh orange juice and all-bran or muesli, milk, plain yoghurt, actimel, sliced seasonal fruit, wholemeal bread, unsalted margarine, sugar-free jam, coffee or tea with skimmed milk

40€

BRUNCH

Fresh orange juice and sliced seasonal fruit

Fried or scrambled eggs with bacon, tomato, assorted cheeses, iberian cold meats

Handmade pastries, butter, jam and honey, coffee or tea

45€

SIDES

Bakery Assortment

Contains: gluten, lactose

16€

Half Plate of Fresh Assorted Fruit

14€

Toasts with Jam, Butter, White Bread or Whole Grain Bread

contains: gluten, lactose, seeds, nuts

10€

Yogurt, Granola & Fresh Fruit

contains: lactose

12€

"A LA MINUTE" EGGS AND ALL TIME FAVORITES

Eggs Prepared to Your Liking

contains: egg

12€

Eggs Benedict

contains: egg

14€

Pancakes

contains: lactose, gluten, egg

9€

Waffels

contains: lactose, gluten, may contain soy

9€

CHARCUTERIE & CHEESE

Iberian Products Platter

Spanish Iberian ham, chorizo, salchichón (sort of salami), lomo

25€

Ham, Turkey, Truffled Mortadella

18€

Chesse Platter

22€

Smoked Salmon

15€

*Gluten-free bread available on request
